text: Yi kuraharuko dhyanarakha ra jo kohi allahadvara nirdharita maryadaharuko adara gardacha, yo usako palanakartakaham usaiko nimti ramro hunecha, ra timro nimti caupaya pasuharu halala gari'eka chan, ti baheka juna ki timila'i bhanisaki'eko cha. Tasartha timiharule murtiharuko apavitratabata bacnuparcha ra jhutho kuraharubata pani bacnuparcha
